resources.string: I will make it in due time.
I have so much to be grateful for.
I see opportunities awaiting me at every turn.
I see good things coming into my life.
I see each day getting better.
I see success all around me.
I will always be grateful in everything.
I will live each new day like is golden.
I work hand in hand with my creator every moment.
I see family as everything, but God as all things.
I would never doubt my strength in achieving my goals.
I know I can make it.
I know that I can stand no matter what comes my way.
